def_cn: (用于投影的)透明正片，幻灯片
def_en: A transparency is a small piece of photographic film with a frame around it which can be projected onto a screen so that you can see the picture.
Transparency is the quality that an object or substance has when you can see through it.

def_cn: (过程、情形或陈述的)透明度，清晰度
def_en: The transparency of a process, situation, or statement is its quality of being easily understood or recognized, for example because there are no secrets connected with it, or because it is expressed in a clear way.
